summary: This bill, the Dennis John Benigno Traumatic Brain Injury Program Reauthorization Act of 2025, reauthorizes and amends the Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) program. It focuses on prevention, surveillance, and data collection related to TBI, including identifying high-risk populations. The bill also authorizes appropriations, provides state grants for TBI projects, and mandates a report to Congress on TBI and its impacts, including a study on long-term symptoms. The bill seeks to improve efforts in TBI research, treatment, and prevention.
